thread.title: Russia’s Cheap Stocks Show What ‘Value’ Misses

author: James Mackintosh
title: Russia’s Cheap Stocks Show What ‘Value’ Misses
text:
Russian stocks are dirt cheap. Should you buy them?
The question is likely to provoke a hollow laugh from many investors as they ponder the prospect of a renewed Cold War between east and west. Send capital there? Are you mad?
It is true that Russia looks like a terrible place to invest based on both politics and long-term fundamentals: It... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
